titleStmt.title: Fasciculus literarium, or, Letters on several occasions I. Betwixt Mr. Baxter, and the author of the Perswasive to conformity, wherein many things are discussed, which are repeated in Mr. Baxters late plea for the nonconformists, II. A letter to an Oxford friend, concerning the indulgence Anno 1671/2, III. A letter from a minister in a country to a minister in London, IV. An epistle written in Latin to the Triers before the Kings most happy restauration / by John Hinckley ...
titleStmt.author: Hinckley, John, 1617?-1695.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
"Epistola veridica ... cui additur oratio pro statu ecclesiae ... Londini excusum, 1659" has separate t.p. and paging.
